availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Lanckart (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, machinist.)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, machinist. Maryland native. Married to Mary I. Lanckart. Machinist in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 2, p. 405.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington Ward 2, p. 206A.
"Joseph Lanckart (1791-1872)," Find A Grave, Memorial 57877809, accessed December 5, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/57877809.
